title: Gemini Chat
description: Interact with Google's Gemini 2.0 model. Supports both text and image input.

response.response: This is Gemini's response based on the prompt and/or image.

curl:
curl -X POST \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN" \
  'https://matic.eu.org/api/gemini' \
  -F "prompt=What is shown in this image?" \
  -F "image=@/path/to/image.jpg"
